name: Paid Unlimited Scorecard License Welcome
subject: Welcome to Decidifi
body:
Welcome to Decidifi – Let’s Get Started!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Welcome to Decidifi! We’re thrilled to have you as a paid subscriber and excited to support you in making confident, informed decisions for both work and life.

Here’s how you can make the most of your subscription:

  • Learn the Basics: If you have questions about how Decidifi works or want to explore its functionality, visit the How Decidifi Works tab—it’s a great place to start.
  • Explore the Library: With access to our full library of 500+ decision scorecards, you can tackle decisions across personal, professional, and life categories.
  • Start a Scorecard: Jump right into a decision you’re facing today and see how Decidifi’s structure helps simplify the process.
  • Save and Revisit: Use your account to save progress and revisit scorecards as your decisions evolve.

While we occasionally update the scorecard library, we’re always open to creating new scorecards for topics with broad appeal to our community. If there’s something specific you’re looking for, feel free to reach out—we’d love to hear from you.

Thank you for choosing Decidifi. Your journey toward clearer, more confident decision-making starts now!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Contact Us
subject: New Contact Us Inquiry
body:
Welcome to Decidifi – Contact Us!

Name: {{USER_NAME}}

Email: {{USER_EMAIL}}

{{MESSAGE}}

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Contact Us Reply
subject: We Have Received Your Inquiry
body:
Welcome to Decidifi – Contact Us!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Thank you for contacting Decidifi. We have received your inquiry and will endeavor to respond within 24 hours.

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Email OTP
subject: Email Confirmation OTP
body:
OTP Verification Email

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Please enter the following code in the Decidifi app:

{{OTP}}

This password will expire in 3 minutes, so please do not delay. Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: End of Free Trial
subject: Don’t Miss Out—Your Decision-Making Journey Awaits!
body:
Trial Ending Soon - Decidifi

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Your free trial with Decidifi is coming to an end, and we hope you’ve enjoyed exploring the tools that make decision-making clearer and more confident.

We’d love for you to continue your journey with us! With a paid subscription, you’ll gain:

  • Unlimited access to your chosen scorecard or our library of 500+ decision scorecards.
  • Personalized insights to simplify even your toughest choices.
  • Seamless access to your trial data—all your saved scorecards and progress will be waiting for you.

You can purchase a paid subscription by clicking here. Still unsure? Check out our Subscribe to Decidifi scorecard to help you decide.

Thank you for trusting Decidifi to support you in making confident, informed decisions. We can’t wait to welcome you!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Free Trial Welcome
subject: Your Free Trial is Here!
body:
Welcome to Decidifi Free Trial

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Welcome to your 48-hour trial of Decidifi! To make the most of your limited trial period, here are a few suggestions to help you dive into the platform:

  • Validate a Past Decision: Use one of our scorecards to analyze a decision you’ve already made and see how Decidifi’s structure might confirm (or challenge) your previous choice.
  • Make a Current Decision: Apply a scorecard to a decision you’re actively working on—whether personal, professional, or life-related—and experience how Decidifi can guide you toward clarity and confidence.
  • Explore the Library: Take time to browse as many scorecards as possible. This will give you a comprehensive understanding of how Decidifi’s tools can simplify decision-making across various areas of work and life.

With Decidifi, every decision becomes clearer and more manageable. We’re excited to have you on board and hope you’ll take full advantage of the trial!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Six Months Post Free Trial
subject: Let’s Reconnect—Discover New Scorecards at Decidifi!
body:
Let’s Reconnect—Discover New Scorecards at Decidifi!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

It’s been six months since your free trial, and we’ve been making improvements to Decidifi ever since! Our Scorecard Library offers decision-making tools designed to help you with even in-depth decisions. If you’re interested in checking out the updates, we’d love to have you back! You can purchase a subscription by clicking here. And if you're unsure, why not use our Subscribe to Decidifi scorecard to help you decide.

Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Three Months Post Subscription
subject: We've Missed You—Check Out What's New in Decidifi!
body:
We’ve Missed You—Check Out What’s New in Decidifi!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

We hope you’re doing well! It’s been a little while since your Decidifi subscription ended, and we’ve missed having you around. Since then, we’ve continued to add tools to simplify important personal, professional, and life decisions. We’d love for you to take another look!

If you’re ready to dive back in, you can purchase a paid subscription by clicking here. As always, we’re here to support you in making confident, informed decisions. If you’re still unsure, feel free to try our Subscribe to Decidifi scorecard to help with your choice.

Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Twelve Months Post Free Trial
subject: It’s Been a Year—Here’s What’s New at Decidifi!
body:
It’s Been a Year—Here’s What’s New at Decidifi!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

We hope this message finds you well! It’s been a year since your free trial, and a lot has changed at Decidifi. We’ve added a range of new scorecards to help you navigate even more of life’s important decisions, and we’re excited to share them with you. If you’d like to explore our latest updates, you can purchase a subscription by clicking here. If you’re still unsure, feel free to try our Subscribe to Decidifi scorecard to help guide your decision.

Looking forward to reconnecting soon!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

We hope this message finds you well! It’s been a year since your Decidifi subscription ended, and a lot has changed. We’ve added a range of new scorecards to help you navigate even more of life’s important decisions, and we’re excited to share them with you.

If you’d like to explore our latest updates, you can purchase a subscription by clicking here. If you’re still unsure, feel free to try our Subscribe to Decidifi scorecard to help guide your decision.

name: Post Free Trial Check In
subject: We’ve Missed You—Check Out What’s New in Decidifi!
body:
Welcome Back to Decidifi

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

We hope you’re doing well! It’s been a little while since your free trial with Decidifi, and we’ve missed having you around. Since then, we’ve continued to add tools to simplify important personal, professional, and life decisions. We’d love for you to take another look! If you’re ready to dive back in, you can purchase a paid subscription by clicking here. As always, we’re here to support you in making confident, informed decisions. You might even want to try our Subscribe to Decidifi scorecard to help with your choice.

Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

We hope you’re doing well! It’s been a little while since your free trial with Decidifi, and we’ve missed having you around. Since then, we’ve continued to add tools to simplify important personal, professional, and life decisions. We’d love for you to take another look! If you’re ready to dive back in, you can purchase a paid subscription by clicking here. As always, we’re here to support you in making confident, informed decisions. You might even want to try our Subscribe to Decidifi scorecard to help with your choice.

Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

name: New Scorecards Added
subject: Check Out What’s New at Decidifi!
body:
What’s New at Decidifi!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

We’re excited to update you on what’s new at Decidifi! Over the past few months, we’ve been working hard to add fresh decision scorecards and improve the platform to enhance your experience.

New Scorecards Added:

    {{#each scorecards}} {{/each}}

We Want to Hear From You!
We’d love to get your feedback on how we’re doing and what we can improve. Please take a minute to fill out this short survey and let us know how Decidifi is working for you. You can also share any insights or recommendations for future scorecards or platform upgrades.

Take Decidifi’s 1-Minute User Experience Survey

Thank you for being a valued member of Decidifi. We look forward to continuing to help you make more confident, informed decisions.

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: One Day Pre License Renewal
subject: Final Reminder: Your Decidifi Subscription Renews Tomorrow
body:
Final Reminder: Your Decidifi Subscription Renews Tomorrow

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Just a quick reminder that your Decidifi subscription is set to auto-renew tomorrow. If you wish to continue using our library of decision scorecards, no action is needed. Your subscription will renew automatically using the payment method on file. If you need to update your payment information, now is the perfect time to do so to avoid any issues with your renewal. And if you'd like to opt out of auto-renewal, simply disable the auto-renewal feature in your account settings.

Thank you for being a part of Decidifi, and we look forward to continuing to support your decision-making journey.

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Post License Renewal Welcome
subject: Thank You for Renewing Your Decidifi Subscription!
body:
Thank You for Renewing Your Decidifi Subscription!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Thank you for renewing your Decidifi subscription! We’re excited to continue supporting you in making informed, thoughtful decisions with our expanding library of decision scorecards.

Your commitment to improving your decision-making process is something to celebrate, and we’re honored to be a part of your journey. Keep an eye on our platform for new scorecards, tools, and updates designed to make your choices even clearer and more confident.

Thank you for trusting Decidifi. We’re here whenever you need us.

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Other Decision Maker Invitation
subject: You’re Invited to Collaborate on a Decidifi Scorecard
body:
Invitation to Contribute to a Scorecard

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

{{PARENT_USER}} has invited you to contribute to a decision-making scorecard on Decidifi. Your input is essential to helping make an informed and confident decision.

To get started:

  • Click the Link: Use this link to access the specific scorecard you’ve been invited to contribute to.
  • Log In to Decidifi: Log in using the following credentials:

Email: {{EMAIL}}
Password: {{PASSWORD}}

  • Contribute to the Scorecard: Once logged in, you’ll be automatically directed to the scorecard. Review the existing data and add your input to assist {{PARENT_USER}} in making the best decision.

If you’re unsure how to complete a scorecard, click ‘How Decidifi Works’ within the platform for detailed instructions on contributing effectively.

Thank you for your valuable contribution!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Paid Single Scorecard License Welcome
subject: Welcome to Decidifi
body:
Welcome to Decidifi – Let’s Get Started!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Welcome to Decidifi! We’re excited to support you in making confident, informed decisions with your new scorecard.

Here’s how you can make the most of your purchase:

  • Learn the Basics: If you have questions about how Decidifi works or want to explore its functionality, visit the How Decidifi Works tab—it’s a great place to start.
  • Dive Into Your Scorecard: Open your purchased scorecard and start working through the decision at hand. When you’re ready, name and save it to your account for future access.
  • Refine and Revisit: Once saved, you can revisit your scorecard anytime to refine your decision as circumstances evolve.

While your access is limited to this scorecard, we occasionally create new scorecards for topics with broad appeal to our community. If there’s something specific you’re looking for, feel free to reach out—we’d love to hear from you.

Thank you for choosing Decidifi. Your journey toward clearer, more confident decision-making starts now!

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Survey
subject: Feedback Request
body:
Decidifi User Experience Survey

User Name: {{USER_NAME}}

User Email: {{USER_EMAIL}}

1. How satisfied are you with the variety of decision scorecards currently available on Decidifi? {{QUESTION1}}
2. How well do Decidifi scorecards help you simplify your decision-making process? {{QUESTION2}}
3. How easy is it to navigate and use the Decidifi platform? {{QUESTION3}}
4. How satisfied are you with the level of customization available when using scorecards (e.g., adding criteria, weighting options)? {{QUESTION4}}
5. How likely are you to recommend Decidifi to a friend or colleague who needs help making important work or life decisions? {{QUESTION5}}

Please review this submission and consider the feedback to improve the Decidifi user experience.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Thirty Day Pre License Renewal
subject: Your Decidifi Subscription is Set to Renew Soon
body:
Your Decidifi Subscription is Set to Renew Soon

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

We hope you're enjoying your Decidifi experience! This is a reminder that your Decidifi subscription is set to auto-renew in 30 days. If you'd like to continue simplifying your decision-making with access to our library of scorecards, no action is needed, and your subscription will renew automatically. To avoid any issues with your renewal, we recommend verifying that your payment information is up-to-date. You’ll also receive a final reminder 24 hours before your renewal date. And if you'd like to opt out of auto-renewal, simply disable the auto-renewal feature in your account settings.

As always, we’re here to support you with tools to help with your important life and work decisions. If you have any questions or need to make changes to your account, feel free to reach out to us.

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.

name: Disabled Auto Renewal Reply
subject: We’ll Miss You at Decidifi—You’re Always Welcome Back!
body:
We’ll Miss You at Decidifi—You’re Always Welcome Back!

Dear {{USER_NAME}},

Thank you for using Decidifi! We’ve noticed that you’ve disabled the auto-renewal feature for your subscription, and we just wanted to say that we’ve loved having you with us.

We’re continuously updating our library with new decision scorecards, so if you ever decide to come back, we’ll be here with even more tools to help you make confident, informed choices. Should the occasion arise in the future, we’d love to welcome you back to Decidifi—you’ll always have a place here.

If you have any questions or need assistance, don’t hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Ian Tonks
Founder, Decidifi

This email was sent to ian@decidifi.com. Unsubscribe or update preferences.

© 2025 Decidifi. All rights reserved.
